name: vbugle
description: vBugle will highligh possible security bugs in Java/C/PHP/C++/ASP source code, using the current Bugle list. To get the most recent bug list go to http://www.cipher.org.uk/index.php?p=projects/bugle.project . Very small at the moment but if you want to give more bug regexp submit them at the link above.
install_details:
Put the file into your syntax directory and do : 
:runtime! syntax/vbugle.vim
